title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 181.5 - Persons authorized to issue warrants
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 181.5 - Persons authorized to issue warrants

State Regulations
A warrant shall be issued by: (a) a youth service team supervisor or
designee in the home community; and
(b) a program or facility director or
designee in the local community where it is reasonable to believe that the
youth is in the vicinity of that facility or program. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
181.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
